# contextforge_roots (Data Source)

Lists roots from the ContextForge MCP Gateway.

## Example Usage

```terraform
# Copyright (c) HashiCorp, Inc.

data "contextforge_roots" "all" {}
```

- `id` (String) Placeholder identifier.
- `roots` (Attributes List) List of roots. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--roots))

### Nested Schema for `roots`

- `name` (String) Root name.
